amendment.description: To increase by $4,000,000 the amount authorized to be appropriated for research, development, test, and evaluation for the Navy for the development, validation, and demonstration of warfighter rapid awareness processing technology for distributed operations within the Marine Corps Landing Force Technology program, and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4475 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4475 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S6346-6366) To increase by $4,000,000 the amount authorized to be appropriated for research, development, test, and evaluation for the Navy for the development, validation, and demonstration of warfighter rapid awareness processing technology for distributed operations within the Marine Corps Landing Force Technology program, and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4475 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4475 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Akaka.
